name: pentestagent
description: PentestAgent is an AI agent framework for black-box security testing, supporting bug bounty, red-team, and penetration testing workflows.
readme_summary: PentestAgent is an AI-powered framework designed for automated black-box security testing. It supports various penetration testing workflows, including bug bounty hunting and red-teaming, by leveraging AI agents to interact with systems and identify vulnerabilities.
key_features: AI agent framework for black-box security testing
Supports bug bounty, red-team, and penetration testing workflows
Configurable with OpenAI, Anthropic, or LiteLLM-supported providers
Offers TUI, Docker, and command-line interfaces
Extensible with built-in and MCP-supported tools
Supports multiple agent modes: Assist, Agent (autonomous), and Crew (multi-agent)
primary_use_case: Automated black-box penetration testing and security assessment using AI agents.
cover_image_prompt: A highly intelligent, stylized robotic falcon with glowing blue eyes, perched on a digital globe representing the internet. The falcon is actively scanning the globe, with streams of data flowing from its eyes and transforming into intricate, glowing security vulnerability icons (like broken shields or warning signs) that detach and float around it. In the background, a subtle, abstract representation of a network map is visible. The overall mood is one of focused, automated intelligence. The PentestAgent logo is subtly integrated into the falcon's design. The style should be a futuristic, 3D isometric illustration with a dark, tech-focused color palette and dramatic lighting.

name: trafexia
readme_summary: Trafexia is a desktop application built with Electron, Vue 3, and TypeScript that functions as a MITM proxy server. It allows users to intercept, analyze, and debug HTTP/HTTPS traffic from mobile devices, offering features like auto CA certificate generation, real-time capture, advanced filtering, and various export options.
primary_use_case: Intercepting and analyzing HTTP/HTTPS traffic from mobile devices for debugging and development purposes.
cover_image_prompt: A stylized, transparent glass sphere acting as a powerful magnifying lens, hovering over a miniature, bustling cityscape representing mobile devices. The lens focuses on individual data packets flowing from the city, revealing their inner workings like glowing blueprints or intricate clockwork mechanisms. Subtle digital streams and code snippets emanate from the lens, indicating analysis and understanding. The Trafexia logo is subtly integrated into the base of the lens. The overall mood is one of clarity and insight, with a clean, modern aesthetic and a color palette of blues, whites, and subtle glowing accents. The style should be a 3D isometric illustration, emphasizing the interception and detailed examination of mobile traffic.

name: neohtop
description: üí™üèª Blazing-fast system monitoring for your desktop (built with Rust, Tauri & Svelte)
readme_summary: NeoHtop is a modern, cross-platform system monitoring application built with Rust, Tauri, and Svelte. It provides real-time insights into CPU, memory usage, and running processes, offering advanced features like process search, filtering, and management.
key_features: Advanced process search and filtering with regex support
primary_use_case: Desktop system monitoring and process management
cover_image_prompt: A vigilant digital conductor standing at a grand console, orchestrating a symphony of data streams representing system processes. The conductor's hands, glowing with energy, manipulate holographic charts and graphs that visualize CPU and memory usage in real-time. Input streams of raw process data flow into the console, transforming into organized, beautiful visual outputs. Subtle UI elements and code snippets are integrated into the console's design. The scene is set in a futuristic, dimly lit control room with a cool blue and green color palette, emphasizing clarity and control. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with sharp details and a clean composition, clearly depicting NeoHtop as the central control hub for system performance.

name: open-oasis
readme_summary: This repository provides Python inference code for the Oasis 500M model, an interactive world model based on diffusion transformers. It allows users to generate gameplay frames autoregressively, conditioned on user keyboard input and a prompt frame from a video.
primary_use_case: Generating interactive gameplay frames using the Oasis 500M world model.
cover_image_prompt: A digital artist sitting at a futuristic console, with their hands hovering over a keyboard. As they type, streams of vibrant, animated pixels flow from the keyboard onto a large holographic screen, forming a dynamic and evolving video game scene. The artist's actions are visualized as glowing energy connecting their hands to the screen. Subtle UI elements displaying code snippets and video frames are visible on secondary monitors. The overall scene is set in a clean, modern studio with soft, ambient lighting, rendered in a 3D isometric illustration style with a focus on clarity and digital aesthetics.

name: AutoRLAIF
description: AutoRLAIF  is a cutting-edge framework designed to revolutionize the fine-tuning of large language models through Reinforcement Learning from AI Feedback (RLAIF).
readme_summary: AutoRLAIF is a Python framework that automates the fine-tuning of large language models using Reinforcement Learning from AI Feedback (RLAIF). It leverages techniques like QLoRA and PEFT for efficient training and integrates multiple datasets to improve model performance with minimal human supervision.
key_features: High-Efficiency Training with QLoRA and PEFT
Integration of multiple datasets (human preference, chatbot conversations, AI-generated pairs)
Scalable Architecture for large datasets and models
primary_use_case: To automate and enhance the fine-tuning of large language models using Reinforcement Learning from AI Feedback, making the process more efficient and performant.
cover_image_prompt: A master craftsman, depicted as a wise AI entity, is meticulously sculpting a large, amorphous cloud of raw data into a perfectly formed, glowing conversational chatbot avatar. The AI uses ethereal tools that represent QLoRA and PEFT, subtly glowing with digital energy. Input data streams in as disorganized scrolls and chaotic code snippets, while the output is a polished, responsive AI assistant. The background is a clean, futuristic workshop with subtle UI elements displaying training progress and feedback loops. The overall mood is one of intelligent creation and refinement. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style, with a vibrant yet focused color palette, emphasizing the transformation from raw potential to refined intelligence.
